Html: Could anyone tell me if it would be possible to Group specified rows so that they can be toggled visible and invisible by the user, This is usually done by using a plus sign that appears to the left of the grouped cells, so they can be toggled. If this is not possible, would it be difficult to implement? This is the only feature I still need.
Can you create a file in Excel 2003 / 2007 where you did this, and send it to me?

I have sent you an example file as requested and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Thanks,

J
Will check in the coming weekend.
